snippet.title: Gex 64 Trailer 1998
snippet.description:
Gex 64 Trailer 1998

Official Content From Midway Entertainment

What do you get when you cross hilarious one liners with tail attacks and flying karate kicks? Well Gex is back and funkier than ever. Join him in free roaming 360 degree gameplay and an all new deep sea swimming level. Can geckos swim?
Platforms: Sony PlayStation, Nintendo 64, PC CD

Sony PlayStation, Nintendo 64, PC CD
, Adventure,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Gex 64
